metadata.name: THE COFFIN
metadata.description:
I have always loved stories of man and the sea. My grandfather was a sailor who traveled the world from 1940s to 1960s. When I was a child he told me many stories of his life on the high seas. Some were funny, some made me sad, and some were scary. 

Sunken boats and shipwrecks have always been one of my favorite subjects to explore, so I have spent many hours looking for them and photographing them using the magical tool of long exposure.

They all keep stories of man and the sea, like the ones my grandfather told me.


Year: 2021  
Edition: 1/1  
Location: Spain  
Size: 7709x5142 px  
License: Extended Editorial
